headline: Is It Too Late To Consider AppLovin (APP) After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Run
summary: If you are wondering whether AppLovin’s share price still offers value after a strong multi year run, the key question is how the current price compares with its fundamentals. The stock closed at US$535.44, with a 5.9% decline over the last 7 days, a 25.0% decline over 30 days, a 13.4% decline year to date, but a 56.1% gain over the last year and a very large gain over 3 years. Recent coverage has focused on AppLovin’s role in mobile app marketing and software tools, which helps explain why...
